welcomeDescription: The best platform for you, bodybuilder or trainer, to manage your workouts.
name: Name
alertName: Name must be between 3 and 100 characters.
alertPassword: Password must be between 10 and 20 characters, with at least one symbol, number, and letter.
notFoundContactInfo: Your contact information was not found. Try logging in or registering again.
confirmIdentityDescription: Fill in the boxes below with the code we sent you.
notFoundUserInfo: Your user information was not found. Try registering again.
configDescription: Configure your profile for a more personalized experience!
configAlert: You can always change your settings after creating your account.
anonymousComplaintDescription: Enable this so your profile is not displayed in complaints you make.
anonymousRatingDescription: Enable this so your profile is not displayed in reviews you make.
emailNotificationsDescription: Enable this so you receive our email notifications.
darkThemeDescription: Enable this to have a darker interface colors.
englishDescription: Enable this so the app text is in English.
signUpAsTrainer: I want to sign up as a trainer.
photoAlert: Select a JPG, JPEG, PNG, or WEBP photo of up to 1mb.
crefDescription: Add your CREF number to convey more credibility to your clients!
alertTrainerDescription: The professional description must not exceed 1200 characters or 15 line breaks.
limitAlertTrainingPlans: You have reached the limit of 20 training plans.
removeConfirmTrainingPlan: Do you want to remove this plan permanently?
trainingPlansDescription: Add, edit, or remove as many training plans as you want!
createTrainingInstruction: Create your first training plan by clicking the button below.
errorAlertCreateTrainingPlan: There are still errors in the training plan form!
limitAlertTrainingDays: You have reached the 9-day limit for this training plan.
removeConfirmTrainingDay: Do wou want to remove this day of your plan?
createTrainingPlanDescription: Create a complete training plan to use with as many clients as you want!
alertTrainingPlanName: The name must be between 1 and 50 characters.
alertNote500: The note must be no longer than 500 characters.
notFoundTrainingPlanInfo: The training plan information was not found.
errorAlertCreateTrainingDay: There are still errors in the training day form!
limitAlertCardioSessions: You have reached the limit of 4 cardio sessions for this training day.
limitAlertTrainingSteps: You have reached the limit of 12 exercises/sequences for this training day.
removeConfirmCardioSession: Do you want to remove this cardio session from your workout?
removeConfirmTrainingStep: Do you want to remove this exercise/sequence from your workout?
restDayDescription: Enable this to make this day a rest day.
trainingDayNamePlaceholder: Enter the name of the workout
alertTrainingDayName: The name must be between 1 and 50 characters.
alertErrorCardioSession: There are still errors in the cardio session form!
alertCardioDurationMinutes: The duration must be between 10 and 600 minutes.
limitAlertExercises: You have reached the limit of 4 consecutive exercises for this training step.
removeConfirmExercise: Do you want to remove this exercise from the sequence?
alertErrorExercise: There are still errors in the exercise form!
limitAlertSets: You have reached the 10-set limit for this exercise.
removeConfirmSet: Do you want to remove this set from your workout?
pulleyHeightPlaceholder: Select the height of the pulley
alertErrorSet: There are still errors in the set form!
repsOrIsometry: Fill in either the repetitions or isometric time fields
durationSecondsPlaceholder: Enter the duration of the isometric hold
restSeconds: Rest Time for Set in Seconds
alertMinReps: The minimum number of repetitions must be less than the maximum and between 1 and 100.
alertMaxReps: The maximum number of repetitions must be greater than the minimum and between 1 and 100.
alertDurationSeconds: The isometric hold time must be between 5 and 600 seconds.
alertRestSeconds: The rest time must be between 15 and 600 seconds.
chatbotDescription: I'm here to answer all your bodybuilding questions, so ask me anything you want
limitAlertPaymentPlanBenefits: You can display up to 8 benefits in the payment plan.
removeConfirmPaymentPlanBenefit: Do you want to remove this benefit from your plan?
createPaymentPlanDescription: Create a custom payment plan to attract more clients!
alertPaymentPlanName: The name must be between 1 and 50 characters.
alertPaymentPlanFullPrice: The plan price must be between R$9.99 and R$99,999.99.
alertPaymentPlanDurationDays: The contract duration must be between 1 day and 2 years.
alertPaymentPlanDescription: The description must be no longer than 500 characters.
alertBenefitDescription: The benefit description must be between 5 and 300 characters.
contractsEnding: You have reached the end of your contracts!
limitAlertPaymentPlans: You have reached the limit of 6 payment plans.
removeConfirmPaymentPlan: Do you want to remove this payment plan?
errorOcurredPaymentPlans: An error occurred while loading your payment plans!
errorOcurredContracts: An error occurred while loading your contracts!
reloadOrTryLater: Reload the page or try again later.
createPaymentPlanInstruction: Create your first payment plan by clicking the button below.
noContracts: You don't have any contracts yet.
alertTransactionId: This ID is useful for tracking and verifying payment, especially in support cases. Use it as a reference.
errorTrainingContract: Failed to load training information and active contract!
cancelContractConfirm: Do you want to cancel your active contract? You will not receive a refund and will no longer have access to the current training plan.
errorOcurredTrainingContract: An error occurred while loading your training and contract information!
errorOcurredTrainers: An error occurred while loading trainers!
searchTrainersInstruction: Search for trainers and choose one of their payment plans.
noTrainingSended: Your trainer has not sent you a workout yet
noTrainerPaymentPlans: The trainer does not have any payment plans yet
